statements: DELETE FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE reported_cases > 100 AND date_reported <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_id = 1 AND location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE reported_cases > 100 AND reported_deaths > 10;
DELETE FROM Outbreaks WHERE disease_name = 'Flu' AND location = 'City ABC';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 5 OR age > 60;
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 2001 AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1 AND hospital_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Outbreaks WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND affected_population > 5000;
